content: What about just eating the celery?  You lose the benefit of fiber when you juice it.

children.content:
Paula Jones just juice it and eat lots of fiber in addition. The whole point of juicing is to rapidly absorb large quantity of nutritious veggie juice in a concentrated form. Not possible just munching celery. 

No one here is anti fiber. Fiber is great. Phenomenal actually. But you can get it ten ways to Tuesday
Paula Jones you’d never be able to eat enough celery to get the same benefit you’ll get from drinking 16 - 32 ozs of celery juice each day.
Paula Jones well, tats not fair...

Paula Jones what Fran has said in her message is absolutely correct and Anthony William explains all of that in detail in his Medical Medium book on celery. What Joseph said about fiber in his message is correct as well. Just having a leafy green salad with some combo of avocado, red pepper, cucumber, or tomato will supply us with huge amounts of fiber! His book on Celery is really good and well worth reading!
Paula Jones u cannot get out of fiber as u need the celery salts. Juice!

Paula Jones the number one thing about the Medical Medium is celery Juice. That is what he started on years and years ago. A couple of decades at lease. 

The problem is the fiber that’s why it’s juiced and passed through the seive/stranger. Fiber affects its effectiveness. 

You can always use the “trash” layer say in a broth, soup etc.
Paula Jones exactly!
Paula Jones there is no benefit of fibre, its not a nutrient and its indigestible.
Whole grains also have fiber
